review: I didn't think I would have much use for it but with the deal I got it at I figured I would try it anyway. Well it now is our main device in our living room. I love the fact I can control it from my cell phone or laptop. The only thing missing is that it can't stream Hulu Plus (not naively, does stream but lags quite often) or Amazon Prime (cannot stream at all), but that is because of those companies and not the device.
author: Andrew Leslie

review: I bought this for my parents because they always had to go to their basement to watch Netflix. After a short setup, i was able to hand over their devices (one android, one iPhone, one PC) and show them how to successfully watch Netflix on the television. Short setup and simple to use.Just a side note (not an issue in this situation): I thought this was an android device since it's made by Google. It isn't. If you're looking to install games and Kodi, get one of the amazon products. I personally have the Amazon Fire TV and love it.
